snippet.title: Fruit Salon VR Early Access - Official Launch Gameplay
snippet.description:
Link to the game: https://www.meta.com/experiences/25347135998263431/

FRUIT SALON
Welcome to "Fruit Salon", your ticket to a delightful VR adventure! Step into the shoes of a skilled fruit and veggie doctor and embark on a journey through a colorful world of healing and fun.

In "Fruit Salon", you'll encounter a variety of unique fruits and vegetables, each with its own personality and ailments to cure. From bananas to avocado, no produce problem is too big for you to tackle!

Using a range of lifelike tools and mechanics, you'll diagnose, treat, and pamper your fruity patients back to health. 

But "Fruit Salon" isn't just about fixing fruits and veggies – it's about immersing yourself in a world of whimsy and wonder. Explore vibrant environments, interact with charming characters, and uncover hidden surprises as you progress through the game.

So, whether you're a seasoned gamer looking for a fresh new experience or a casual player searching for some fruity fun, "Fruit Salon" has something for everyone. Get ready to dive into a world where healing meets entertainment, and let the adventure begin!
